fullplot: Based upon the true story of Olga Benèrio, the German-born wife of Brazilian communist leader Luès Carlos Prestes. During the dictatorship of Getèlio Vargas (1930-1945) she was arrested and sent to Nazi Germany, where she was put to death in a concentration camp. After World War II began, Vargas decided to uphold the Allies.
